package.name: Config
package.summary: Class for reading and writing Config-"files"

release.notes:
Documentation is in README.Config. 0.2.2 : - Only the first char of ->feature['cc'] is taken as a comment deliminator - quoting supports both methods: [bla] foo = "'bar'" bar = '"foo"' - Value parser only parser until first comment-char or the end of the string, therefore spaces surrounded by nonspaces don't have to be quoted.
0.2.1 : - Bug fixed, when $feature in ParseInput was not set - some e_warnings fixed (thanks to Markus Fischer for the reports)
